text: “Nkololezedwa kwa inu kusaka nyama za m’nyanja ndi chakudya chake (chomwe chapezeka m’nyanjamo chitafa chokha). Chimenecho ndi kamba wanu (inu amene simuli pa ulendo) ndiponso a pa ulendo. Kwaletsedwa kwa inu kusaka za pamtunda pomwe muli m’mapemphero a Hajj kapena Umrah. Opani Allah Yemwe kwa Iye mudzasonkhanitsidwa
